DisplayForm.Script:
<UiScreen infoLevel="Normal"> <Title>title</Title> <AutoTransition>10</AutoTransition> <Operations> <Op type="Submit" action="./0.xml"> <Label imgsrc="submit.jpg">Submit</Label> </Op> <Op type="SkipGo" action="./5.xml"> <Label imgsrc="skipgo.jpg">Skipgo</Label> </Op> <Op type="Back" action="./19.xml"> <Label imgsrc="back.jpg">Back</Label> </Op> </Operations> <LinkScreen> <Description>Description (東京都 山口県 Thailand Cambodia Jordan )</Description>

</LinkScreen> </UiScreen>
